product_name: VAUDE Kiowa 300 UL Sleeping Bag - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Lightweight and warm, this 2-season backpacking sleeping bag has a contoured mummy cut, draft collar and high-loft synthetic insulation to maximize heat retention. It also stays warm even when damp.
short_description: Lightweight and warm, this 2-season backpacking sleeping bag has a contoured mummy cut, draft collar and high-loft synthetic insulation to maximize heat retention. It also stays warm even when damp.
